body: oh yea, did i mention that you are immune to all comments that involve your parents dying and any bad shit. but that doesn't mean you should not live life to the fullest and not talk with your parents. Always hangout and talk with your parents, because life is actually short and your parents don't accompany you your whole life. make good memories with them, so you will always remember them with those good memories, and you will not spend you life living in regret, that "oh why didn't I go with my parents that one time they told me to come". So never forget that everyone dies, and it's just part of the natural process, live your life to the fullest!!

If you are reading this, I am soo soo soo soo sooo soo soo soos oos oos ssoosoo. Alright now you are cursed to have a great and successful life with your parents living as long as possible, are you fucking happy?!! hahahaha, gotcha fuckerssss
